Bringing Flight to Everyone

Flight Enabled Mission

1. Steadily improve small UAVs through iterative software and hardware innovations until they can be trusted to be safe, quiet and capable package delivery vehicles.

2. As small UAVs are proven, iteratively increase sizes so that they can carry passengers and cargo safely and can be piloted as simply as cars.



We think enabling flight for everyone should involve everyone. Similarize is an app (currently in development) to help make it possible for more people to work together on the mission.



Similarize Web App
